senses.sense_definition: One who sells or works with animal hides and skins.

examples.text: The <w>fellmonger</w> carefully separated the wool from the sheepskins before selling them.
In the old industrial district, a <w>fellmonger</w> would often work alongside tanners.

senses.sense_definition: To prepare animal skin for tanning.

examples.text: They used traditional tools to <w>fellmonger</w> the hides for the local market.
It requires significant skill to <w>fellmonger</w> without damaging the delicate pelt.
